title: Riot, some of your passives should be looked at
body:
Heimer: Makes zero sense, since it only gives his turrets more health, that are destroyed in 1 hit late game anyway. His teammates barely use the aura since he is mostly a solo laner, and during the team fights, his passive goes almost unnoticed, since is not big enough to be Very useful.  . 
Quinn : She deserves to have a Passive, when she switches to Valor.
Sydra: It kinda gives her tiny buffs at 4 random levels, however, some buffs are kinda unnoticeable (Extra 0.5 second slow Really ?)
Zilean : His passive is now just sad.
Zyra : Ok she needs buffs in general, but her passive is underwhelming, compared to Kog , who does the same thing, but at least can move around and his does more damage. 

These passives are some that I find need changes, or maybe even a full blown rework.

replies.body: I agree with the Zyra one.  Especially since the plant's firing is super delayed once you click it, it's pretty much luck of the draw if your opponents walk into it or not.
